This method must be implemented by subclasses to store a single object.
storeReference(Relatable, T) - Method in class de.esoco.storage.mapping.AbstractStorageMapping
Default implementation that stores the referenced object inside a transaction.
storeReference(Relatable, T) - Method in interface de.esoco.storage.StorageMapping
May be invoked by a storage implementation to store a modified object of this mapping that is referenced by another object before that object is stored.
STORING - Static variable in class de.esoco.storage.StorageRelationTypes
A flag that is mainly used internally by storage implementations to indicate that a object is currently being stored.

T

toString() - Method in class de.esoco.storage.impl.jdbc.JdbcStorage
 
toString() - Method in class de.esoco.storage.mapping.ClassMapping
toString() - Method in class de.esoco.storage.mapping.FieldDescriptor
Returns the field name.
